title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve
title_original: SKIKYAN Women Bowtie Oversized Knit Sweater Cardigan Y2K Long Sleeve V Neck Open Front Casual Knitwears

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, well-made, and soft, with pretty colors and good value for money. They appreciate its comfort, with one customer noting it's cozy without being itchy, and another mentioning it ties outfits together well. The size receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's not oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
items.body: 5’3” and got a small. It’s a bit oversized so just take note. Quality is actually decent for Amazon. Not amazing or anything but it’s soft and I suspect it’ll hold up in the wash, may have to air dry so it doesn’t pill. Color is as pictures. Cute, light-medium weight. Read more
items.author: Amber

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ties the outfit together!
items.body: Super cute and true to size. Didn’t give it the full amount of stars, because it could be a slightly higher quality (some have reported the ties have become unstitched and I can definitely see how you’d have to be careful about that), but overall, for the style and the price point, I’m not complaining. Could be worn all year long, so you can’t go wrong! IG: @mindy.city Read more
items.author: MK2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Style and quality
items.body: I loved this sweater so much that I immediately purchased it in 2 colors. I now have the pink in my cart! It is so cute, true to size and trending. It is so soft and beautiful quality. You won’t be sorry. Read more
items.author: Julia Mulkay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The color!
items.body: The color is what really makes this. Just as pictured. Style-wise it needs to be tucked in with sleeves rolled up. That’s the only way I think it looks good but I really really love it. Good quality. And again, beautiful color. Read more
items.author: Brit

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars She cute
items.body: She cute. I had this prior to being pregnant and now that I am it is cute with a bump. Its all polyester though so even though she soft, shes already starting to pill in places Read more
items.author: Katie C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater
items.body: I like this sweater more than I expected to! It is stylish, soft and comfort. Very pleased. I did not find it oversized - I usually wear a medium and the medium fit. Read more
items.author: Gayle Giffin Abril

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: Can’t say this is my favorite. First, this is not as oversized as I would prefer it to be, which I prefer clothes like this to be very oversized so it just didn’t hit that mark for me. Also, I think the material looks cheap and not well made. Overall I wouldn’t purchase this again, I would return it but I’m outside of the return window. Read more
items.author: Dev

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute , soft- but not as expected
items.body: Super soft and goood quality sweater. The bow ties are a nice touch but it’s a bit higher neck than expected. It’s a Good kind of oversize, and not too baggy, and the bowties can certainly be tied tighter for less skin showing, but it feels a little awkward. Take a look ColiesAmazonCloset IG Read more
items.author: ColiesAmazonCloset

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Pink, Yellow, Denimblue, Apricot, Black, Armygreen, Rosered. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
